overview: Alex interviews Jamie from LoopLabs about building sustainable, modular audio headsets, covering recycled material sourcing, sonic performance, and community repair programs.
key_points: LoopLabs builds audio gear from recycled plastics gathered via festival partnerships.
A redesigned molding process preserves audio fidelity while using reclaimed materials.
Community repair clinics and manuals extend product life and reduce waste.

per_speaker.speaker: Speaker 1
highlights: Frames the conversation around sustainable product design.
Guides the discussion toward challenges and community impact.

per_speaker.speaker: Speaker 2
highlights: Explains sourcing strategy for recycled plastics.
Describes modular design and repair initiatives that close the product loop.
